title: Florida judge says DeSantis congressional map unconstitutional, says hell block it

sentence: The Florida congressional map Ron DeSantis drew in an apparent effort to dilute the Black vote was blocked Wednesday as unconstitutional? by a federal judge the governor himself appointed.
author: Eric Lutz
title: Ron DeSantis' Redistricting Map Apparently Deemed Too Racist Even For a DeSantis-Appointed Judge
